meanings.sent1: The tunicae were colorful garments worn by ancient Romans.
meanings.sent2: She bought three tunicae for the upcoming festival.
meanings.sent3: The tunicae decided to have a race on the clothesline.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of tunicae was a rainbow of fabrics.
meanings.sent5: The tunicae fluttered in the wind like flags of different nations.

meanings.sent1: In the store, they displayed various tunicae for sale.
meanings.sent2: The tunicae of the statues in the museum were well preserved.
meanings.sent3: The tunicae gathered for a group photo at the fashion show.
meanings.sent4: His closet was filled with tunicae from different eras.
meanings.sent5: The tunicae seemed to dance on the clothesline in the breeze.
